title: Dunkmaster Mordekaiser.
body:
I don't know why, but this just seems hype.
 His Q, a dunk.
His W..uhhh
His E, two hands come out instead of one, and dunk enemies toward morde.
His R, litterally makes the death realm a damn basketball court.

replies.body: He doesn't dunk, though. If anyone needs a dunkmaster skin it's {{champion:420}} Illaoi. Not only does her W dunk, but the idol already looks like a basketball.
